content:
On the left bank of the Kherson region, Ukrainian pilots of UAVs are burning enemy equipment.

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

As it is noted, in the southern direction of the pilots of the UAV of the State Border Guard Service found and destroyed 1 SAU, 2 armored vehicles, 2 trucks, composition of property and caused fire damage to the positions of the invaders.

“Fire support with unmanned aviation systems is an integral part of the combat theater today. The tactics are constantly being improved, depending on the enemy maneuvers, ”the pilot on the pseudo" Grimm ".

As reported by the Armyinform, Warriors of SCO work:"Sunpsyok", 2 tanks, 3 BBM and 26 occupiers now fertilizer.
title: Defense forces have shown how enemy technique is burning in Kherson region
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine informs about it. ...
author: Army Inform
